European Leaders to Hold Call With Zelenskiy on US-Russian Plan Bloomberg.com
titles: As Trump Pushes on Russia-Ukraine Peace Plan, Zelensky’s Options Are Narrowing
European Leaders Back Zelensky After Trump’s Russia-Ukraine Peace Plan Excludes Them
European Leaders to Hold Call With Zelenskiy on US-Russian Plan - Bloomberg.com
summary: A U.S.-Russian proposal suggests Ukraine should cede territory and reduce its military in exchange for potential benefits to Russia, such as reintegration into the global economy if Moscow complies. European leaders are scheduled to discuss the plan with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy. The proposal is under consideration, with no agreement reached yet.

title: Lost Security Key Blocks Access to Election Vote Tally
snippets: A global group of researchers was unable to read the vote tally, after an official lost one of three secret code keys needed to unlock a hyper-secure election system.
Voting system required three keys. One of them has been "irretrievably lost."
titles: Cryptology Group Held an Election, but Can’t Decrypt the Results
Oops. Cryptographers cancel election results after losing decryption key.
summary: A group of researchers could not access the vote tally from a hyper-secure election system because one of the three required secret code keys was lost by an official. With the key "irretrievably lost," the system cannot be unlocked, and the vote results remain inaccessible.

This NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope image features a galaxy, NGC 2775, that’s hard to categorize.
titles: Hubble Captures Puzzling Galaxy
Hubble Seeks Clusters in ‘Lost Galaxy’
summary: NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope images have captured two notable galaxies. NGC 2775, located 67 million light-years away in the constellation Cancer, has a smooth, gas-free center resembling an elliptical galaxy, making it difficult to classify. NGC 4535, about 50 million light-years away in Virgo, appears faint in small telescopes and is known as the ‘Lost Galaxy’. Both galaxies highlight the diversity of galactic structures.
